Class SnmpTable

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
org.snmp4j.agent.ManagedObject, org.snmp4j.agent.mo.MOTable, org.snmp4j.agent.MOScope, org.snmp4j.agent.SerializableManagedObject
public class SnmpTable
extends org.snmp4j.agent.mo.DefaultMOTable

Forms a SNMP table used in the reader management implementation.
